main event: Observers in Kirksville, Missouri reported seeing a bright, colored light in the western sky, which was later concluded to be Venus.
interesting points: The light was approximately 2 degrees in width and green in color., The object was initially hovering, then moved laterally about 5 degrees before disappearing., Multiple witnesses including students and a hospital records clerk reported the sighting., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes., Weather conditions during the observation were clear with excellent visibility.
sighted object: a bright, green light in the sky
witness description: Observers included a records clerk, high school students, and college students, all with good reliability.
